title: Shiromuku-san wa Oyome ni Yukitai
original_name: 白無垢さんはお嫁にゆきたい
sinopse:
Yomeko Otonashi is a master of machikon (matchmaking parties). She attends them in the traditional shiromuku wedding dress, searching for a man who would be willing to immediately get married after the event.

[Written by Denji]
